template.name: BasicsDubboProvider
template.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <beans xmlns="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:dubbo="http://code.alibabatech.com/schema/dubbo" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans/spring-beans.xsd http://code.alibabatech.com/schema/dubbo http://code.alibabatech.com/schema/dubbo/dubbo.xsd">
<!-- 提供方应用信息，用于计算依赖关系 --> <dubbo:application name="basics-${projectName}-service" />
<!-- 使用zookeeper注册中心暴露服务地址 --> <dubbo:registry protocol="zookeeper" address="${cluster1.serverList}" />
<!-- 用dubbo协议默认在20880端口暴露服务 --> <dubbo:protocol name="dubbo" port="${dubbo.provider.port}" dispatcher="all" threadpool="fixed" threads="${dubbo.provider.threads}" />
<dubbo:provider filter="user" timeout="${dubbo.provider.timeout}" retries="${dubbo.provider.retries}"/> <!-- read -->
<!-- write -->
</beans>
